phrs.translation: 锁骨胸骨端开放性骨折

sentences.sentence: Objective To locate the new mark of the Right Neck-Clavicle Isosceles Triangle (RNClT) for the right venous angle puncture.
sentences.translation: 目的研究以“颈锁等腰三角”为新标志的右静脉角穿刺的应用解剖。

sentences.sentence: Wire fixation between coracoid process and clavicle plus ligament repaired is a reliable way for acromioclavicular joint dislocation.
sentences.translation: 喙锁间钢丝固定韧带修复是治疗肩锁关节脱位的一种可靠方法。

sentences.sentence: Result: Satisfactory results were achieved in 83% of the patients after receiving clavicle hook plate operation; problems were found in 5 cases.
sentences.translation: 结果83%的患者术后效果非常满意，出现5例肩锁钩钢板临床运用不当。
